title: Live Minutes Away From Your Favorite Stores And Restaurants!
posting_body: ['Lake Washington Luxury Rentals.', 'Villaggio on Yarrow Bay: Waterfront Apartment Homes.', 'Villaggio on Yarrow Bay welcome you home!', 'Our waterfront apartment homes are located in Kirkland, Washington.', 'With lake views and luxurious floor plans, Villaggio on Yarrow Bay provides a virtual oasis to come home to.', 'With easy access to downtown Kirkland waterfront, all of life’s excursions are just moments from home: waterfront parks, Kirkland Performance Center, restaurants, decorative art and novelty stores, and an abundance of beautiful parks.', 'Outlining the community you will also find ample trails for hiking and biking.', 'At Villaggio on Yarrow Bay we offer one, two bedroom and three-bedroom apartment homes that have been beautifully crafted with designer interiors, such as plush carpeting, hardwood style flooring, custom cabinetry, and so much more!', 'Browse our photo gallery and call to schedule a tour today and see for yourself what apartment living should be like!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 93', 'OR Text', '93', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1075 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Maple Cabinetry', '- Additional Storage Available*', '- Stainless Steel Appliance Package', '- Wood-Style Flooring*', '- Average Apartment Size more than 1000 Square Feet', '- Cozy, In-Suite Fireplace', '- Track Lighting', '- Elegant Crown Molding', '- Dual Shower Heads', '- Computer Niche', '- Faux Wood Blinds', '- Marble Entries', '- Granite Countertops and Backsplash', 'Community Amenities', '- Four Lighted Tennis Courts', '- Theater with Stadium-Style Seating', '- Heated Resort-Inspired Pool', '- Lush Landscaping', '- Sand Volleyball and Service Requests', '- Relaxing Spa', '- Boat Slip', '- Executive Business Center and Conference Room', '- Sun Deck', '- Controlled-Access Community', '- Kayak Rack', '- Dog Park', 'Pet Policy',
